page.title: 15LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: Life in a rural area can be full and active.People are to be seen driving into the village for meetings,art and clay modelling classes and other cultural activities.Or they may be en route for workers educational classes at Radwinter or Cambridge or adult education at Saffron Walden.Walking is popular;and there are field sports, shooting for game and,after the harvest,hunting with the East/Essex. Special events may be organised for fun or to raise funds,such as the recent sponsored cycle ride in which energetic cyclists toured churches in the area in support of the Friends of Essex Churches.People may also belong to local societies such as the Sampfords Society or the Great Bardfield Historical Society.Local women collect wild fruits and berries to delight the eye and appetite.
